description:
After humiliating herself, Kotomi runs off and completely changes her image. Her new look is red hot, but Junta still isn`t interested--until he realizes that the two of them are more alike than he thought! Can Kotomi press her advantage enough to win the heart of the budding Mega-Playboy?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cosa ha fatto Junta a Kotomi?
Junta wa Kotomi ni Nani o Shita?
Qu`est-ce que Junta a fait à Kotomi ?
What has Junta Done to Kotomi?
純太はことみに何をした?
